welcome to wikimedia the wikimedia foundation inc we or u is nonprofit charitable organization whose mission is to empower and engage people around the world to collect and develop content under free license or in the public domain and to disseminate it effectively and globally free of charge

to support our vibrant community we provide the essential infrastructure and organizational framework for the development of multilingual wiki project and their edition a explained here and other endeavor which serve this mission we strive to make and keep educational and informational content from the project available on the internet free of charge in perpetuity
